title: Ticket #3576: Remove code that could overflow buffers and is not used
description: Found some code that uses strcpy without checking the length of the target buffer. It turns out this code is not used, so it is being removed.
check_ins:
2013-Apr-22 11:52   Check-in [35485]: Remove more unused data #3576 Nobody is actually using uidDomain and fsDomain here. UID_DOMAIN is looked up in the config in publishShadowAttrs. [...] (By Nathan W. Panike )
2013-Apr-16 19:40   Check-in [35435]: Increase functionality by removing code #3576 Removing this code because: 1. It looks like it has buffers that can be overflowed 2. No one is using it. Also note that it is in the shadow, so we get another win. (By Nathan W. Panike )
creator: nwp
